ValidationRule.description: If Org Structure=Other (need notes to specify), Org Structure Notes must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( ISPICKVAL( Org_Structure__c , "Other (need notes to specify)") , IsBlank(Org_Structure_Notes__c)) && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Org Structure Notes are required if you have selected Other (need notes to specify) in the Org Structure.
